name: Last Outta Dustin
description:
You find yourself in a strange, run-down town. No idea how you got here. No way to get out. If you help put the town back together maybe, just maybe, you'll find a way to finally leave this nightmare behind. But beware! You may actually like it and end up staying.

Forage what you can, defeat those who oppose you and build a town like no other.

Explore this virtual world and find those that have been affected by this tragedy you are now involved in. They will help you out.

---

Platform: Oculus Quest

Comfort options: Full Locomotion, Snap Turning
